rooms.description: A welcoming space with a modern minimalist design incorporating natural light to align with Vastu principles. It includes an open-plan living area and dining section.
The main studio apartment integrates a living space with an en-suite bathroom and a private balcony. The design incorporates ample storage solutions to maximize space.
A dedicated library space with custom shelving and comfortable seating areas to encourage reading and relaxation. Designed with soundproofing features to ensure a quiet environment.
A compact yet functional servantâ€™s quarters with a kitchenette and storage areas to provide comfortable accommodation.

openings.description: A modern glass door entrance with a reinforced steel frame ensuring security and energy efficiency.
The balcony adjoining the master bedroom offers a private outdoor space designed for relaxation while following Vastu guidelines regarding orientation.
Large windows in the library to maximize natural light and create a serene reading environment.
